text: is a Japanese photographer and contemporary artist. He is also known by the mononym . He is known for his photography works. He has published over 500 books.The number depends on such things as how new compilations of previously published are counted. But as of 2005 Kōtarō Iizawa counted 357 in Araki-bon! 1970–2005 () / A Book of Araki Books! 1970–2005 (Tokyo: Bijutsu Shuppansha, 2006; ). (Despite the alternative title in English, the book is only in Japanese.) ==Notes== ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese photographers Category:Artists from Tokyo
title: Nobuyoshi Araki
